name: Comelito DLC Pack
description:
This is a DLC pack for Comelito, download this ONLY if you have comelito DLC ver.

When you open it, you can choose a DLC and when you select it, a code will appear in the comelito DLC Ver. Scan the code to unlock that DLC.

the full version with dlc mode: https://sivlesoft.itch.io/comelito-full-dlc-ver
